name: Echo!
description:
Welcome to Echo! Echo is more than just a game, it's a completely new and unique gaming experience,  designed to force you to reimagine how you Interact with your world and surroundings! Echo has no Visual Interface when it comes to the Gameplay, meaning you will have to depend on your Hearing senses, to complete the game from start to Finish!

Game Story Summary 

You are a soldier who recently lost his eyes,  You were abducted and trapped inside the Sticky Dungeon, Your mission is to escape the dungeon and find your missing eyes.  In order to move and navigate across the 'Map' You move your Cursor and click Left Click, the left click will trigger your sound gun, your sound gun will release a sound ray which will be reflected from difference surfaces with different sounds. When you identify the correct surface (the Door) simply click W and you will navigate towards the sound. Remember Don't Bump into the walls or Pits, other wise you lose your eyes forever!

Samples of the sounds are given in the Menu! Press E to begin the game!
